'''Undertowers''' was a dwelling of [[Hobbits]] in the [[Westmarch]] during the [[Fourth Age]]. It was located near the [[White Towers]].

It was at Undertowers that [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]]'s daughter [[Elanor Gardner]] settled with [[Fastred of Greenholm]] around {{SR|1462}}. Thus the [[Fairbairn Family]], the hereditary [[Warden of Westmarch|Wardens of Westmarch]] was founded.<ref>{{App|Later}}</ref> 

Undertowers was one of the three places of the Shire with the largest libraries and collections of historical documents, the others being [[Brandy Hall]] and [[Great Smials]]. Its library contained the [[Red Book of Westmarch]], chronicling the [[War of the Ring]] and the [[Elder Days]].<ref>{{FR|Records}}</ref>
